title: No Place Like Home
description:
Looking for a powerful and gripping new psychological thriller? Then discover the unmissable No Place Like Home today.
What would you do if you came home to find someone in your house?
This is the predicament Polly Cooke faces when she returns to her new home. The first weeks in the house had been idyllic, but soon Jacob, a local man, is watching her.What does he want and why is he so obsessed with Polly?In a situation where nothing is what it seems, you might end up regretting letting some people in.
What everyone is saying about No Place Like Home:

"Clear your diary!! No Place Like Home is really hard to put down once you pick it up" 
Elaine McGuinness - Reviewer

"This is a dark psychological thriller with a fantastic plotline and believable characters" 
Margaret Leonard - Reviewer

"I devoured in one sitting, enjoyed and found the twists in the tale engrossing" 
Julie Robinson - Reviewer

"I love a good domestic noir and this is one of the best I have read." 
Peggy Beaver - Reviewer

"A brilliantly clever, well thought out read." 
Nick Murphy - Nicki's Book Blog

"Wow, absolutely loved this book from the beginning to the end and it kept me gripped from start to finish with plenty of twists and turns." 
Carol Drinkwater - Reviewer



No Place like home is a suspenseful domestic noir thriller, it will appeal to fans of authors like Louise Jensen, Claire Mackintosh and B A Paris.
author: Rebecca Muddiman
